des: Get help for [command]. If no arguments passed, show the full help string.
Send <message> to you after <time>. <time> should be in format: AdBhCmDs, must less than 24d.
Get a picture of a girl (Chinese: Meizhi) from [source]. Available source: gank (gank.io), meizitu (meizitu.com). Default: the source you used the last time (or 'gank' on first use)
[DEBUG] Output the milliseconds of parsed time. Format: AdBhCmDs
